definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: fei1 dong4 wu4 xing4 ming2 ci2

sentences.english: He had the animal pleasures of a strong man.
sentences.chinese: 他有着强壮男人的动物性嗜好。
动物性食物置人于死地。

sentences.english: Today, Howard Lyman goes around the world, talking about the harmful effects of animal protein.
sentences.chinese: 今天，他走遍世界诉说动物性蛋白给人体带来的伤害。

sentences.english: The Bith have become totally dependent on technology, having long since lost all their animalistic traits and instincts.
sentences.chinese: 他们高度依赖科技，早已摈弃了所有的动物性和本能。

sentences.english: So you're driven to animalistic puffery.
sentences.chinese: 所以你趋于采用动物性的夸张。

sentences.english: A sensitive HPLC method was developed for the rapid determination of chlorpromazine residue in animal-derived foods.
sentences.chinese: 建立动物性食品中氯丙嗪残留的HPLC检测法。

sentences.english: And so over the years, protein tended to be associated with animal-based foods.
sentences.chinese: 因此许多年来，蛋白质总是与动物性食物联系在一起。

sentences.english: NB: The change is to take animal-derived products off their plate.
sentences.chinese: 最好的改变就是让他从盘中餐里去除动物性食品。

sentences.english: But there's something very primal, very animalistic about it.
sentences.chinese: 但是这的确是很原始，很动物性的。

sentences.english: Professor Galloway says animal protein plays a big part.
sentences.chinese: 加洛韦教授说，动物性蛋白质起着巨大作用。

sentences.english: Man is a entia of animality and civilization.
sentences.chinese: 人是动物性和文化性的统一。

sentences.english: Crime were rooted in the animality of human nature, that is human instinct.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪根源于人的动物性，即人的本能。

sentences.english: The compound bait and the animal bait showed little palatability.
sentences.chinese: 混合饵料及动物性饵料对黄胸鼠的引诱力不大。

sentences.english: Now, I’m not going to say there’s no more animal-based food in the staff dining room.
sentences.chinese: 现在，我不会说工作人员餐厅没有动物性食物了。

sentences.english: Talk about animalistic fashion for this year.
sentences.chinese: 谈到今年的动物性的方式。

definition: human nature/humanity/human/the totality of human attributes
male and female/both types (acid and alkaline, positive and negative etc)/(chemistry) amphoteric
